episode_summary: This episode features facts about Tallulah Bankhead's eccentric pets and lifestyle, an invisible statue auctioned for thousands, the Svalbard Global Seed Vault receiving unusual requests, and Tina Turner suing a lookalike for being too similar.

facts.fact: Actress Tallulah Bankhead had a parrot which she taught to say 'birds can't talk.'
This year, an invisible statue made of air went to auction with an estimate of five thousand pounds.
The Doomsday Vault in Svalbard, which keeps backups of more than a million of the world's seeds, gets regular requests by men who wish to deposit their own seed there.
Tina Turner is currently suing a Tina Turner lookalike for looking too much like Tina Turner.
